definitions.definition: A coarse mat at the entrance to a house, upon which one wipes one's shoes.
examples: Wipe your shoes on the doormat before you start plodding around in the house.

definitions.definition: Someone who is overly submissive to others' wishes.
examples: He's such a doormat , he lets everyone walk all over him.

main_definition: A coarse mat at the entrance to a house, upon which one wipes one's shoes.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , derogatory ) Someone who is overly submissive to others' wishes.
